greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest number not occurring earlier and smaller than the largest square so far, the next square if no such number exists.
comment: Permutation of the natural numbers, inverse: A143052;
link: Peter Kagey, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(n) = if n=0 then 0 else if n=1+k^2 then n+2*k else n-1.
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 20 2008
